name: Better Than Beef Broth
description: Enjoy all the rich, herby, and umami goodness of beef broth, but in a vegan, plant-based alternative. This broth is packed with flavour boosters like tamari powder, nutritional yeast, and mushroom powder. It's instant, with good-for-you ingredients. Rest easy knowing there's no caramel colour or added MSG in here.
preparation: 1. Stir mix into boiling water. Use broth to cook grains, one-pot pastas, soups, stews, sauces, gravies, and more.
